content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'REC_ISSU' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'GLOVIA_PROD')
CREATE TABLE GLOVIA_PROD.REC_ISSU
	(
	 [CCN] nvarchar(500),
	 [MAS_LOC] nvarchar(500),
	 [RECEIVER] nvarchar(500),
	 [REC_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [REC_ISSU_SEQ] nvarchar(500),
	 [SERIAL] nvarchar(500),
	 [ORDER_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [ORDER_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [TYPE_] nvarchar(500),
	 [ORDER_BOM_USEQ] nvarchar(500),
	 [OPERATION] nvarchar(500),
	 [QTY] numeric(38,18),
	 [SALES_CCN] nvarchar(500),
	 [ISSUE_REVERSIBLE] nvarchar(500),
	 [BIN] nvarchar(500),
	 [LOCATION] nvarchar(500)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO


CREATE TABLE GDelta.REC_ISSU
	(
	 [CCN] nvarchar(500),
	 [MAS_LOC] nvarchar(500),
	 [RECEIVER] nvarchar(500),
	 [REC_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [REC_ISSU_SEQ] nvarchar(500),
	 [SERIAL] nvarchar(500),
	 [ORDER_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [ORDER_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [TYPE_] nvarchar(500),
	 [ORDER_BOM_USEQ] nvarchar(500),
	 [OPERATION] nvarchar(500),
	 [QTY] numeric(38,18),
	 [SALES_CCN] nvarchar(500),
	 [ISSUE_REVERSIBLE] nvarchar(500),
	 [BIN] nvarchar(500),
	 [LOCATION] nvarchar(500)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO
--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_REC_ISSU
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO GLOVIA_PROD.REC_ISSU
(CCN 1, MAS_LOC 2, RECEIVER 3, REC_LINE 4, REC_ISSU_SEQ 5, SERIAL 6, ORDER_NUM 7, ORDER_LINE 8, TYPE_ 9, ORDER_BOM_USEQ 10, OPERATION 11, QTY 12, SALES_CCN 13, ISSUE_REVERSIBLE 14, BIN 15, LOCATION 16)
FROM 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/GLOVIA_PROD/REC_ISSU/WO-INITIAL.parquet'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM GLOVIA_PROD.REC_ISSU
GO
